title: Projects
text:
Course: AD688 ‚Äì Cloud Analytics for Business (Boston University)
Project Overview:
As part of a team-based analytics project, we analyzed trends in the Business Analytics, Data Science, and Machine Learning job market. The goal was to understand hiring demand, required skills, salary drivers, and the impact of remote work using real-world job posting data.
Methods & Tools:
- Python (data analysis, preprocessing)
- SQL
- Regression models (Polynomial Regression, Random Forest)
- K-means clustering
- Data visualization & presentation
Key Contributions & Results:
- Built and compared salary prediction models to identify key compensation drivers
- Applied clustering to segment analytics roles (Data Analysts, ML Engineers, Big Data Engineers, entry-level roles)
- Identified skill gaps and hiring trends across industries and job types

title: Projects
text:
Quantitative Methods for Finance
Course: AD685 ‚Äì Quantitative Methods for Finance (Boston University)
Project Overview:
Conducted a quantitative analysis of Airbnb listings in Melbourne to understand the key factors influencing pricing and to build predictive models for listing prices.
Methods & Tools:
- Python and statistical modeling
- Regression and predictive modeling
- Exploratory financial data analysis
- Feature selection and model evaluation
Key Contributions & Results:
- Analyzed listing characteristics (location, property features, demand indicators)
- Identified the most significant drivers of Airbnb pricing
- Built predictive models to estimate listing prices
- Interpreted results in a financial and business context
Outcome:
Developed a data-driven pricing framework demonstrating how quantitative methods can support revenue optimization and investment decisions in short-term rental markets.

title: Projects
section: Financial Operations Optimization ‚Äì Gold Mining & Processing Company
text:
Financial Operations Optimization ‚Äì Gold Mining & Processing Company
Role: Finance Manager
Project Overview:
Led financial and operational analysis for a company engaged in gold mining and gold processing. The objective was to improve operational efficiency, identify bottlenecks, and increase overall revenue.
Methods & Tools:
- End-to-end production process analysis
- Financial performance analysis
- Operational controls, checklists, and KPI tracking
- Workforce productivity optimization
Key Contributions & Results:
- Analyzed the full production workflow to identify operational bottlenecks
- Implemented controls and standardized checklists across operations
- Optimized workforce scheduling and labor utilization
- Increased company revenue by approximately 20%
- Improved efficiency without increasing headcount
Outcome:
Successfully translated financial analysis into operational improvements, delivering measurable revenue growth and sustainable process optimization.

title: CV
text:
Profile
Finance manager and business analyst with experience leading budgeting, analytics, reporting systems, and process improvements across multiple industries. Strong at partnering with product and operations teams to turn data into decisions.

title: CV
text:
Professional Experience

Finance Manager ‚Äî BTS Digital Venture
Astana, Kazakhstan ¬∑ Feb 2022 ‚Äì Aug 2024 - Led day-to-day financial operations and developed reporting systems. - Drove budgeting/forecasting and supported analytical & management reporting. - Performed regular and ad-hoc analysis of company and product performance. - Designed complex financial models for product decisions.


Finance & Operations Manager ‚Äî EDMAR GROUP LLP
Astana, Kazakhstan ¬∑ Apr 2021 ‚Äì Feb 2022 - Managed 8 subsidiary companies (logistics, copper scrap processing, ore mining & processing, airline/rail ticket sales). - Prepared annual/current financial budgets and controlled execution. - Conducted financial/economic analysis to improve management processes and business performance.


Associate ‚Äî PwC
Astana, Kazakhstan ¬∑ Jan 2019 ‚Äì Apr 2021 - Provided audit consulting on financial reporting for local and international clients. - Maintained effective communication with clients and team members.
